componentDescription: Displays rich content on hover, with customizable trigger and content presentation.

children.description: Optional React nodes to be rendered within the HoverCard component.

views.description: Optional object to pass custom view properties to specific parts of the HoverCard. It includes 'container' for the main container view and 'content' for the content view, both accepting ViewProps.

openDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds before the hover card opens after the trigger is hovered.

closeDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds before the hover card closes after the trigger is no longer hovered.

children.description: The React node that acts as the trigger for the hover card.

views.description: Optional object to pass custom view properties to specific parts of the Trigger. It includes 'container' for the container view, accepting ViewProps.

asChild.description: If true, the trigger will render its child directly without an additional DOM element.

children.description: The React nodes to be displayed inside the hover card content area.

views.description: Optional object to pass custom view properties to specific parts of the Content. It includes 'container' for the container view, accepting ViewProps.

side.description: The preferred side for the content to open relative to the trigger element.

align.description: The alignment of the content along the chosen side ('start', 'center', or 'end').

sideOffset.description: The distance in pixels between the content and the trigger element.

backgroundColor.description: The background color of the hover card content.

borderRadius.description: The border radius of the hover card content.

boxShadow.description: The box shadow applied to the hover card content.

padding.description: The internal padding of the hover card content.

minWidth.description: The minimum width of the hover card content.

maxWidth.description: The maximum width of the hover card content.
